0.description: This is a top to bottom dramatic looking pastry with its bright color of red which is sharply contrasted by a very fresh white cream frosting. This pastry can easily get you completely lost with the amazing flavor that derives when the pastry almost instantly melts in your mouth. Enjoy each bite of this scrumptious pastry.

1.description: Here's another classic flavour to leave you spellbound. This scrumptious butterscotch pastries with its luscious flavour is all set to entice you with its caramel shavings and delicious toppings. We bet you would swoon over the pleasing taste of your favourite flavour

2.description: This pastry is all about perfection. Made from the finest quality of chocolate, this delicious pastry proudly boasts lips-smacking chocolate covering

3.description: Award yourself with the delish flavours of mango pastries and lose yourself in their sumptuous appeal like never before. The mushy base enrobed with almond shavings and topped with mango glaze and chocolate crown are not only going to satiate your sweet tooth desires but also remind you of the summertime goodness!

4.description: An enticing dessert to drench your tastebuds in the dreamy, creamy taste in the first bite. Experiencexp sweetness of fresh strawberries with the melting drifts of cheese layer and a baked crust layer in the bottom. Strawberry bake cheese pastry is the perfect treat for the tastebuds at any time of the day.

5.description: Tender eggless red velvet cupcake topped with wholesome creamy white frosting and red velvet sprinkles.

6.description: Moist bread topped with whipped cream and decorated with Blueberry Puree and sprinkles, the cupcake awaits your bite-some appreciation.

7.description: This rich, chocolaty dessert is topped with whipped cream and sprinkled with chocolate chips. Perfect for any chocolate lover!

8.description: Give a mouth-watering definition to your celebrations with these cupcakes. They come with the heavenly combination of chocolate, whipped cream and lip-smacking Oreo. Each bite of this cake will take you above-the-bar of food satisfaction. It's time to make this eve sweeter with these cupcakes.

9.description: This cup cake does not only look nice but it also taste just delicious. Coming with the vanilla whip cream and a edible sugar or sprinkles, this cup cake could be a real delight for your taste buds.

10.description: This fudgy walnut brownies which are deliciously rich and dense are perfect to satiate one's cravings or for gifting purposes. A perfect accompaniment for tea, coffee and other such hot/cold beverages, this set of classic walnut brownies are sure to leave one drooling with its rich taste, texture, and fantastic appeal.

11.description: Topped with a generous spread of dark creamy chocolate and baked to absolute perfection, this brownie is the closest thing to divinity! Order this bite of creaminess and impress your dearest ones immediately with the srumptious richness of chocolate.

12.description: A cookie made in heaven. If you are craving for something chocolaty then these melt-in-mouth cookies are your perfect pick. These bite-sized cookies are tastier than they look. Just dunk them in your favorite choice of beverage, be it tea, coffee or eat it right away!
12.info: One pack weighs 100gms. Contains milk and eggs

13.description: Who doesn’t love crunchy and delicious cookies? The distinctive, delicious and uncommon taste of almond cookies will quickly your taste buds. So, for the upcoming occasions of your loved ones be it birthday or anniversary, grab this jar of almond cookies.
13.info: One pack weighs 100gms. Contains milk and eggs

14.description: With swirls of soft vanilla and chocolate, this moist, tender and fluffy marble cake is a delight to your taste buds. It is a wonderful teacake that can go perfectly as a snack to serve with tea or coffee. It can be relished by all age groups and a perfect gift for any occasion.
14.info: One cake weighs 300gms. Contains milk and eggs

15.description: Healthy and tasty, through and through, this delightful dry cake is divine at every bite, extremely moist, super fluffy and wholesomely decadent. Grab this yummy cake for your health conscious loved ones. Compliments tea and coffee perfectly, so grab this dry cake now!
15.info: One cake weighs 100gms. Contains milk and eggs

16.description: This one is a southern classic! With a mild white chocolate flavour and extremely mushy layers, you just cannot resist its lavish redness, its delish white chocolate shavings and more so, its fresh creamy frosting. Made of three layers of moist base flavoured with melt-in-the-mouth red velvet joy and garnished magnificently with richly whipped cream, this sumptuous treat is all you need to bet on!

17.description: Always and Forever Delight! This three layered moist and smooth cake filled with butterscotch chips and Vanilla cream is something not to be missed! Topped with Butterscotch glaze and white chocolate flakes, adorned with scrumptious caramel dressing on the sides, it's time to feel the crunch!

18.description: The heavenly taste of this Choco Truffle Cake will even leave the hardest-to-please chocolate addicts tranquil in every sense. Prepared with three layers of relishing chocolate cream filled in between the soft stacks of chocolate cake, and adorned with beautiful chocolate icing and rich glaze chocolate coating, this one is just irresistible.

19.description: The chocolate and vanilla blend beautifully in texture, yet pleasantly contrast in color and flavor. Watch your special ones relish with excitement when they experience the unforgettable taste of this rich and creamy three-layered cake. Beautifully finished into a heart-shape with chocolate shavings and cherries on one side and hand-crafted Red Rose on the other, is indeed, a Torrid Love Affair.

20.description: Dive Deep Into The World Of Real Strawberries As You Delight Yourself And All Your Loved Ones With This Scrumptious Baked Strawberry Cake. Topped Up With Tiny Fondant White Flowers And Some Chocolate Drizzle, This Strawberry Cake Is No Less Than A Dream For Every Strawberry Cake Lover Out There.

21.description: For moments of bliss and happiness, a cake ornamented with real flowers makes a quintessential pick. The two-tier cake is wrapped in cream that is left unsmoothed purposely. And the light colour flowers are placed on top of both tiers with little strings of natural greens.

22.description: Make special days memorable with this beautifully hand-crafted Queen and king cake. This cake is as delicious as it is adorable. Sweep your loved ones off their feet by surprising them with this luscious beauty and win their heart with your thoughtfulness behind the sweet gesture.

23.description: Extend your best wishes to your loved ones on any special occasion with our scrumptious fondant cake. This three-tier cake’s decoration is a sight to behold. It has beautiful decor of roses and sugar pearls. Cake can be customised according to your preference.

24.description: Notch up your celebration be it anniversary, wedding or party with this heartcrafted two tier cake. Baked with love and utmost perfection, order this two tier cake and serve your guest the best cake ever. You can customise the flavor as per your choice.
